commit.message:
make test-cargo-miri only about cargo

remove rand (large dependency) and page-size (testing the dependency, not cargo-miri).
keep only byteorder as a "demo" dependency, it is a leaf and builds quickly.

files.patch:
@@ -2,6 +2,12 @@
 # It is not intended for manual editing.
 version = 3
 
+[[package]]
+name = "byteorder"
+version = "0.5.3"
+source = "registry+https://github.com/rust-lang/crates.io-index"
+checksum = "0fc10e8cc6b2580fda3f36eb6dc5316657f812a3df879a44a66fc9f0fdbc4855"
+
 [[package]]
 name = "byteorder"
 version = "1.4.3"
@@ -12,32 +18,25 @@ checksum = "14c189c53d098945499cdfa7ecc63567cf3886b3332b312a5b4585d8d3a6a610"

- "byteorder",

  "issue_1567",
  "issue_1691",
  "issue_1705",
  "issue_1760",
  "issue_rust_86261",

@@ -9,4 +9,4 @@ edition = "2018"
 crate-type = ["cdylib"]
 
 [dependencies]
-byteorder = "1.0"
+byteorder = "1.0" # to test dependencies of sub-crates

@@ -134,7 +134,7 @@ def test_cargo_miri_test():
         env={'MIRIFLAGS': "-Zmiri-permissive-provenance -Zmiri-disable-isolation"},
     )
     test("`cargo miri test` (with filter)",
-        cargo_miri("test") + ["--", "--format=pretty", "le1"],
+        cargo_miri("test") + ["--", "--format=pretty", "pl"],
         filter_ref, "test.stderr-empty.ref",
     )
     test("`cargo miri test` (test target)",
